professional_summary: Experienced Microsoft SQL Server Database Administrator with 6 years of expertise in database management, performance tuning, and high-availability solutions. Certified in administering Microsoft SQL Server 2012/2014 databases.

key_responsibilities: Administered MS SQL Server 2008 and migrations to 2008 R2/2012.
Implemented security policies and backup/disaster recovery plans.
Monitored database performance and rebuilt indexes for optimization.
Managed SQL Server 2008/2008 R2 and newer versions.
Created maintenance plans and applied patches and hotfixes.
Configured replication and disaster recovery processes.
Administered SQL Server 2008/2008 R2 and migration tasks.
Implemented security protocols and backup plans.
Monitored database performance and optimized SSIS packages.
